original_body_lines: The 'Dewani Yuddhaya' movie media show took place recently at the Tharangani Theater. The movie was Directed by V. Sivadasan including the cast of Jayalath Manoratne, Pubudu Chathuranga, Warnakulasooriya Udari, Dilhani Ekanayake, Sarath Kothalawala, Buddhika Jayarathne, Keith Ranga, Rukshana Dissanayake, Thushini Fernando and Anura Waragoda. Pix by Pradeep Dilrukshana
